p: Although the City of Cape Town had the strategy to educate and raise greater awareness on the need to be water efficient and wise, LaFrance ( 2018) notes that ‘Capetonians’ did not all warm up to the campaign. As of 31 January 2018, an estimated 55% of the residents were complying with the rationed quantities. Following the declaration of Day Zero, there was great hype in the political space, complicated by the institutional set-up that has all three spheres of government with something to do regarding climate change, drought and water. The dynamics are presented in the next section.
